name: Fly's Journey
description:
Fly's Journey is a bullet hell style game where you experience the daily encounters of a fly. The game is split into "waves" of enemies where you fight to survive and to continue investigating the surroundings that you were born into.

I created this game for The Honest Jam III, which is the first game jam I have partaken in. I've never created a game fully from scratch in a limited amount of time before and it was a very fun learning experience which I look forward to partaking in again.

CONTROLS

Movement - Keyboard: WSAD / Controller: Left Joystick

Shoot - Keyboard: Spacebar / Controller: A

Credits

The game and all of the components were made by my wife and I. All of the sounds are modified mouth noises and the art was all made in paint.net.

Programs

Unity: 2020.1.8f1

Paint.Net: 4.2.14

Audacity: 3.1.2
